content.en: Wastewater treatment optimization: Researchers have been using algorithms such as response surface methodology (RSM), artificial neural network (ANN), and other artificial intelligence (AI) models to improve various processes in wastewater treatment. These algorithms are being used to predict and optimize the efficiency of processes like adsorptive removal of pollutants, phosphate and heavy metal removal, and electrochemical and electrocoagulation treatments. By utilizing these algorithms, scientists are able to develop models that can accurately predict and optimize the removal of contaminants from wastewater, leading to more effective and efficient treatment methods.
content.da: Optimering af spildevandsbehandling: Forskere har brugt algoritmer såsom respons overflade-metodologi (RSM), kunstige neurale netværk (ANN) og andre kunstig intelligens (AI) modeller til at forbedre forskellige processer i spildevandsbehandling. Disse algoritmer bliver brugt til at forudsige og optimere effektiviteten af processer som adsorptiv fjernelse af forurenende stoffer, fosfat- og tungmetalfjernelse samt elektrokemiske og elektrokoagulationsbehandlinger. Ved at anvende disse algoritmer kan videnskabsmænd udvikle modeller, der præcist kan forudsige og optimere fjernelsen af forurenende stoffer fra spildevand, hvilket fører til mere effektive og effektive behandlingsmetoder.
